reviews.text: We stayed here for just a night since we needed to make an early departure for Tateyama Kurobe Alpine Route. The building and lobby was impressive and location was pretty good. Very close to the station and steps away from the tram stop.
reviews.title: So Warm!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Front Desk was very friendly. They even gave us free Loop Tram tickets! Which we did utilise to go to the Toyama Castle.
reviews.title: An OK hotel

reviews.text: However, upon entering the room, we found out that the airconditioner would only turn on for a minute before switching off again! The room was pretty small and with no air it was getting too warm and stuffy. The manager came up and informed that it wasnt faulty but meant to work that way since it is still running as centralised heating and not airconditioning. He opened the window but it was too noisy. So finally he upgraded us to the larger room. Thank God since with the larger room it was not stuffy and as warm.
reviews.title: Good value

reviews.text: 1. Visit Toyama Castle at dusk (6.30-7pm) for blue hour. Photographying the castle at this time is is so beautiful with the reflection of the castle in the moat and the blue sky background.
reviews.title: Excellent Service
